column2: Frank, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: Have diverticulosis and after the second incident of diverticulitis I asked the doctor if I could take a fiber supplement.  He thought it would be okay.  Plus I wanted the extra fiber. column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have bile salt colitis from having my gallbladder rmvd 3 years ago. I have been sick every day of my life for past 3 years. Dr thought I had chrones, but as of yet unable to find it. I do still move my bowels about 4 times a day, but for the first time they are formed and normal again. It has slowed my system way down. So greatfull to have my life back.
